channel.title: Road Equipment on Universal
channel.description: Recent content in Road Equipment on Universal

item.title: E02562
item.description: Caterpillar D5B, E-rops Cab, Cat 3306DI engine with 105HP (78kW), semi U-blade with tilt, 3 speed powershift transmission, drawbar, cutting edge 70% remaining, undercarriage on average 80% remaining, new carrier rollers, new sprockets, 560mm pads, 11.500 Kgs operating weight. Machine has new paint, is workshop tested and is in very good and clean condition.

item.title: E02943
item.description: Komatsu GD530A-1, Low profile E-rops cab, 6 cylinder turbocharged Komatsu diesel engine, powershift transmission, 12ft (3.65 Mtr) moldboard, new cutting edge, centershift, hydr. tipcontrol, scarifier, rear ripper with full set of new shanks, engine enclosures, 14.00-24 tyres 70%. Machine has new paint and is in very clean condition. Inspections are welcome. All manuals are available.

item.title: E03698
item.description: Caterpillar D7G, E-rops cab, Cat 3306 engine, 3 speed powershift transmission, semi U blade/tilt, 610mm pads, undercarriage 75% remaining, drawbar. Machine comes straight out of work and is in ex job site condition. Rear ripper or rear pulling winch available at extra cost. Machine can be painted at extra cost.

item.title: E03991
item.description: Caterpillar SS-250B soil stabiliser, enclosed cab, ROPS, 6 cylinder turbocharged Cat 3406 engine, 3 speed hydrostatic transmission, speed meters miles and KM, 2WD, front and rear steering, tyres front 28L-26, tyres rear 14.9R24, rotor width 240Cm, rotor diameter 120Cm, tips on average 90% remaining (some replaced), PTO driven rotor. Machine comes straight out of work, has new paint and is in clean condition. Inspections are welcome.

item.title: E04233
item.description: Dynapac CA15D, Single smooth drum vibrating roller, canopy, 4 cylinder Ford engine with 68HP (51 kW), 7.000 Kgs. operating weight, drum width 1.68 Mtr. (66 inch), drum diameter 1.22 Mtr. (48 inch), 13.6-28 tyres 90% remaining, new seat. Machine has new paint, is workshop tested, fully repaired and is in very good and clean condition. Machine has very low hours.

item.title: E04291
item.description: Case Vibromax 1102D vibratory roller, Cab, Drum Drive, Deutz engine, 2.16 Mtr. drum width, Brand new 23.1-26 tyres, hydrostatic transmission, new seat. Machine has new paint, low hours, is workshop tested, has new paint and is in very good and clean condition. Inspections are welcome.

item.title: E04344
item.description: Bomag BW212 vibrating single drum roller, Cab, 6 cylinder Deutz F6L912 engine with 112HP (82kW), drum width 2.10 Mtr, 23.1-26 tyres, hydrostatic transmission, 11.200 Kgs operating weight. Machine has new paint, is workshop inspected and is in very good and clean condition. Inspections are welcome.

item.title: E04456
item.description: Self propelled Phoenix MKVII chip spreader, 4WD, hydraulic extendable spreader 2.50 - 3.85 Mtr working width, canopy, 6 cylinder Ford Powerstar engine, manual transmission, variable speed drum roller, variable speed feed belts, hydraulic folding rear hoppers, 425/65R22.5 Bridgestone tyres, powersteering. Machine is Ex-Government and comes straight from work. Machine has low hours, new paint and is in clean condition. 2 Similar machines available. Inspections are welcome.

item.title: E04457
item.description: Self propelled Phoenix MKVII chip spreader, 4WD, hydraulic extendable spreader 2.50 - 3.85 Mtr working width, canopy, 6 cylinder Ford Powerstar engine, manual transmission, variable speed drum roller, variable speed feed belts, hydraulic folding rear hoppers, 425/65R22.5 Bridgestone tyres, powersteering. Machine is Ex-Government and comes straight from work. Machine has low hours, new paint and is in clean condition. 2 Similar machines available. Inspections are welcome.

item.title: E04481
item.description: Caterpillar CP533E vibrating single drum padfoot roller, 4 cylinder Cat 3054CT turbocharged engine, 130HP (96kW), canopy, 12.000 Kgs operating weight, drum drive, 2 speed hydrostatic drive, 2.13 Mtr drum width, 2 step vibrating, front & rear work lights, 23.1-26 tyres approx. 80% remaining. Machine has low hours and is in clean condition. Inspections welcome.

item.title: E04488
item.description: Caterpillar D7G Ex-Army dozer, Machine has 462 Hrs from new, O-rops cab with sweeps, engine enclosures, 6 cylinder turbocharged Cat 3306DI engine with 200HP (149kW), semi U blade/tilt, 3 speed powershift transmission, undercarriage 95% remaining, 610mm pads, rear pulling winch, new seat, new paint in Caterpillar colour, 22.500 Kgs operating weight.

item.title: E04561
item.description: Caterpillar D8T Dozer, E-rops cab with airconditioning, 6 cylinder turbocharged Caterpillar C15 ACERT Technology engine with 359HP (268kW), Tier 4 Interim, EPA, 4 barrel SS-ripper with hydr. pin puller, differential steering, wrist control steering, front & rear work lights, rear view camera. Machine comes straight out of work and is in very clean condition. Currently located in Houston Texas, USA. Machine is available for sale or rent, subject to terms and conditions.

item.title: E04618
item.description: Ex-army Caterpillar 130G, Sold new in 2007, only 201 Hrs from new! Machine is in as-new condition, Low profile E-rops cab, 12ft (3.65Mtr) moldboard, scarifier, engine enclosures, 13.00-24 tyres. Machine is in very clean condition. Machine can be repainted in original Cat colors at extra cost. Rear ripper can be supplied at extra cost. Inspections are welcome. 15 units available!

item.title: E04625
item.description: Ex-army Caterpillar 130G, Delivered new in 2002, only 545 Hrs from new! Machine is in as-new condition, Low profile O-rops cab, 12ft (3.65Mtr) moldboard, scarifier, engine enclosures, 13.00-24 tyres. Machine is in very clean condition. Machine can be repainted in original Cat colors at extra cost. Rear ripper can be supplied at extra cost. Inspections are welcome. 15 units available!

item.title: E04626
item.description: Ex-army Caterpillar 130G, Sold new in 2007, only 423 hrs from new! Used for Demo / Training only, Caterpillar engine 147HP, machine is in as-new condition, Low profile E-rops cab, 12ft (3.65Mtr) moldboard, new cutting edge, scarifier, new MS rear ripper fitted, engine enclosures, 13.00-24 tyres. Machine is in very clean and good condition. Operating and parts manual available with the machine.

item.title: E04664
item.description: Caterpillar D6T XL, E-rops cab with airconditioning, 6 cylinder turbocharged Cat C9 ACERT Technology engine with 185HP (138kW), 3 speed powershift transmission, wrist control steering, differential steering, semi-U blade with tilt, new cutting edge, undercarriage average 85% remaining, drawbar, counterweight, front & rear work lights. Ripper or winch can be attached at extra cost. Machine comes straight out of work and is in clean condition. Inspections are welcome.

item.title: E04692
item.description: Ex-army Caterpillar 130G, Sold new in 2008, only 971 hrs on meter. Machine is in as-new condition, Low profile E-rops cab, 12ft (3.65Mtr) moldboard, scarifier, engine enclosures, 13.00-24 tyres. Machine is in very clean condition. Machine can be repainted in original Cat colors at extra cost. Rear ripper can be supplied at extra cost. Inspections are welcome. 15 units available!

item.title: E04695

item.title: E04723

Machine comes straight out of work and is in clean condition. Inspections are welcome. Rear ripper can be fitted on request at extra costs.

item.title: E04736
item.description: Caterpillar D6G XL Series II, delivered new in 2009, E-rops cab with airconditioning, 6 cylinder turbocharged Cat 3306DIT Non-electronic engine with 162HP (119kW), 3 speed Non-electronic powershift transmission, Semi U-blade with tilt, new cutting edge, undercarriage on average 75% remaining, engine enclosures, front and rear work lights, drawbar, operating weight 16.880 Kgs. Machine has low hours and is in clean condition. Inspections are welcome.

item.title: E04745
item.description: Caterpillar D7F Ex-Army dozer, only 943 hours since new! O-rops cab, 6 cylinder turbocharged Cat engine 200HP, Semi U-blade with tilt, 3 speed powershift transmission, undercarriage average 90% remaining, 560mm pads, Hyster rear pulling winch. Machine can be supplied including independent Caterpillar TA inspection, can be equipped with a rear ripper and yellow paint at extra costs. Machine is in good and clean condition. 5 Units expected soon!

item.title: E04750
item.description: Caterpillar 824G, E-rops cab with airconditioning, 6 cylinder turbocharged Cat 3406C engine with 315HP (235kW), 4 speed automatic powershift transmission, blade with double tilt, Command Control Steering, 29.5R29 Bridgestone front tyres & 29.5R29 Michelin rear tyres, 28.495 Kgs operating weight, front & rear work lights, fast fill fuel system, fire suppression system, CE marked. Machine comes straight out of work and is in clean condition. Inspections are welcome.

Machine can be supplied including independent Caterpillar TA inspection on request. Can be equipped with rear ripper and painted in Cat yellow at extra costs.
